content.Name: srv
content.Description: uses a mongodb+srv protocol to connect. Disables the usage of port argument if set to True

content.Name: port
content.Description: Connection port. Required if a non-srv connection is being used.

content.Name: ssl
content.Description: can be set to true to connect using ssl

content.Name: include_schemas_in_destination_stream_name
content.Description: forces the stream names to take the form <database_name>-<collection_name> instead of <collection_name>

content.Name: update_buffer_size
content.Description: [LOG_BASED] The size of the buffer that holds detected update operations in memory, the buffer is flushed once the size is reached

content.Name: await_time_ms
content.Description: [LOG_BASED] The maximum amount of time in milliseconds the loge_base method waits for new data changes before exiting.
